name: Our Perfect Genes
description:
Humanity has evolved using gene editing. One of the creators of this method has enabled you to edit a lineage of clones. Discover the purpose of the lineage for yourself during this struggle for humanity's future. With each clone, the gene information mutates and you need to adapt and change accordingly. Evolve the lineage. Evolve your understanding. Evolve your strategy. Made for GoGodot Jam

--Controller Controls--
D-PAD for movement
Dualshock Circle,Xbox B, Nintendo A to undo move
DualShock Cross, Xbox A, Nintendo B to Accept

--Keyboard Controls--
W,A,S,D for movement
Shift for undo move
Space or enter for accepting

--Mouse controls--
Left click towards the direction from the tile selector
Right Click to undo move
Middle mouse button to accept

Follow me on Twitter, Youtube or Itch for more. I will definitely share more about making this game. Thanks for playing my first jam game! Please give me any feedback. Also this has not been tested for Linux
